title: Fat Bottomed Girls
lyrics:
[intro, single strums]
(D)Aaaare you gonna (C)take me home to(G)night?
(D)Aaaah down be(C)side that red fire(A)light?
(D)Aaaare you gonna (G)let it all hang (G)out?
[strumming] Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round (D)(Hey!)
 
I was (D)just a skinny lad, never (G)knew no good from bad
But I knew (D)life before I left my nurse(A)ry
Left a(D)lone with big fat Fanny, she was (G)such a naughty nanny
Heap big (D)woman you made a (A)bad boy out of (D)me (Hey hey!)
 
I've been (D)singing with my band, across the (G)wire across the land
I seen (D)ev'ry blue eyed floozy on the (A)way
But their (D)beauty and their style, went kind of (G)smooth after a while
Take me (D)to them dirty (A)ladies every (D)time (câ€™mon!)
 
[chorus]
(D)Oh won't you (C)take me home to(G)night?
(D)Oh down be(C)side that red fire(A)light?
(D)Oh and you (G)give it all you got
Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round
Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round
 
[interlude, play only D if too hard]
(Dsus4) (Dsus4) (D) (D) (Asus4-Asus4) (D)
(Dsus4) (Dsus4) (D) (D) (Asus4-Asus4) (D) Hey listen here
 
Now your (D)mortgages and homes, I got (G)stiffness in the bones
Ain't no (D)beauty queens in this locali(A)ty (I tell you)
Oh but (D)I still get my pleasure
Still (G)got my greatest treasure
Heap big (D)woman you made a (A)big man out of (D)me (Now get this!)
 
[chorus]
(D)Oh won't you (C)take me home to(G)night?
(D)Oh down be(C)side that red fire(A)light?
(D)Oh you gotta (G)let it all hang out
Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round
Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round
[single strums]
Fat bottomed (D)girls, you make the (A)rockin' world go (D)round [end]
